it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.ip6

Class Ip6Packet

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.net.DataPacket
      • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.ip6.Ip6Packet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Packet, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Ip6Packet
extends DataPacket
    Internet Protocol version 6 (IPv6) packet (RFC 2460).
